post.body: Awesome! I will definitely have to check them out. Thanks!
Her name is Derby...she was rescued in Kentucky. I know, her eyes are very different.
I saw your Husky in FB...very cute! It was NJ Puppy Rescue in Hampton (Warren county).
German Shepherd/Husky mix, 7 weeks old. She was abandoned in Kentucky (hence her name). A NJ puppy rescue was fostering her.
@PMKU Thanks!
Thanks, Kay! :-)
Ha! I hope not! We are preparing ourselves for our first night with the new baby...planning on not much sleep. We'll see...
Thanks! @JayGregory just left to pick her up! I'm sure I will have a lot more pics coming soon.
LOL. Well, fill me in if you find out!
The kids and mommy and daddy. :-)
German Shepherd/Husky mix
And she's so soft and cuddly...It was hard to leave without her tonight!
Yes, they think she's a German Shepherd/Husky mix. We're still working on her name!
@aranarose Thanks! It was so adorable seeing my 23-mo old with her...this is going to be fun!
No name yet. We're picking her up tomorrow night and hopefully will have a name then!
LOL. I felt like it was late! Glad you got it. :-)
Of course not. We'll see what happens tomorrow. Did you have a good bday?
I don't think so, but thanks. Most of it is kid- and personal-injury related. Ugh.
@mayhemstudios Thanks for the article RT! :-)
I'd be more worried about inciting road rage than startling someone. Just my opinion. :-)
Thanks for the link...now I WILL be listening to that on repeat all day! (in btwn the kids BNL tunes!). http://tinyurl.com/62jjgp
Ankle is OK, no worse, no better, but I'll take it. Thanks for asking! :-)
I want a poker night!!
probably about 75% fiction, 25 non.
I don't follow @edukindle but will start. Thanks!
LOL. And dealing with Grand Central Station when you work at home is an entire challenge on its own!
Love my Kindle! Had it since they first came out. Well worth the cost.
Yep, probably not long before it starts by you. Big flakes and starting to pick up a bit.
Northwest. http://tinyurl.com/3zyf2o
Thank you. I will be waiting for the package of snow. :-)
It just started, it just started. YAY!!!
Doing great, plus its Friday! How are you?
I'll email you this weekend re: my big idea. :-)
No comment. KIDDING! Oh and I need to talk to you about a idea for the board (finally!). If you like, need helping w the girls.
I think I will do some minor work on the paper at the bottom too to make it more obviously "thrown" there. Will send new mockup
It's a pain, but that's OK. :-) Seriously, I don't mind. I will try a blue or green.
Very good point. How can we make all Mondays followed by 2 days off?
@lindahampton Yeah, I'm just all confused! Wrapping up the week and starting a a new one at the same time in my head. AARRGGGHHH!
Are you on? Going to try to get the final site tweaks done this afternoon. Have a bkgrd color in mind?
In bed by 10:30. Getting old, I guess! I just saw your aunt's email. Will look it over later. Thanks!!
Hey, got your emails...will get back to you today on stuff. Have a good NYE?
Oh, I hear you! Happy New Year, btw! :-)
I only wish it worked that way! They rival the Energizer Bunny. Really.
Wow...that's not a great way to form relationships, is it? They must really have an aversion to auto-DMs.
People have off today??? Boo on them. (as you can tell, I am among the worker bees) Hope you had a great holiday!
Right back atcha!
We survived our first night with the new puppy! Here are some pics: http://tinyurl.com/ourderby
I can't believe I haven't tweeted since this morning. What did I miss?
Mailing xmas cards and going to get stuff for the new puppy!
So apparently changing my username gave me a brand new twitpic acct...none of my pics with this account. :(
http://twitpic.com/sc1p - Meet the newest member of the Gregory clan...isn't she cute???
Oh my. Today seriously felt like it was 3 days long.
http://twitpic.com/u6l1 - Someone else likes the snow too.
Anyone else work from home & feel isolated at times? Here are some tips (I need to do some of them more myself!): http://tinyurl.com/3my7eg
RT @IVAALiveSummit: Early Bird registration avail now, get energized & inspired, learn the latest 4 your VA biz! http://live.vasummit.org
Feels like Monday, yet it's a Friday. Utter confusion in my brain.
Retweeting on behalf of @JayGregory: Can anyone recommend a good book on mastermind groups?
Have I mentioned how much I love my bookkeeper? Such a timesaver. She is about 100 x's more efficient than me with QB. AND she's virtual!
I have so many things I'm excited about right now. HUGE announcements to make over the next few weeks. 2009 is going to be phenomenal.
Good morning! It appears 2009 made my kids louder. Maybe it will taper off as the year progresses?
